title: Zucchini Growing Hacks for ENDLESS Harvests!

subtasks: Mix mound soil to desired height (12 inches)
Ensure proper drainage to prevent rot
Warm soil for faster root growth
Hand pollinate flowers for fruit development
Transfer pollen from male to female flowers using stems
Avoid wetting leaves to prevent mildew
Monitor fruit size and harvest when 6-8 inches
Pick zucchini every 2-3 days for continuous harvest
Ask viewers for their favorite recipe in comments
Monitor for signs of mildew or other issues
Adjust care as needed based on plant health
